SDL_Config automated test defines

They don’t form part of SDL_Config API, but are used by test programs to automatically determine whether SDL_Config contains bugs in tested functions.  It should be included after SDL_config.h.

It’s not linked along with SDL_Config library!

Summary
SDL_Config automated test definesThey don’t form part of SDL_Config API, but are used by test programs to automatically determine whether SDL_Config contains bugs in tested functions.
Macros
CFG_WRITE_HEADEROutputs initial “greetings text”.
CFG_BEGIN_AUTO_TESTMarks the start of automated test procedure.
CFG_AUTO_TEST_HEADERWrites the header.
CFG_AUTO_TEST_BOOLTests two booleans, if they are different, outputs what error occured.
CFG_AUTO_TEST_INTEGERTests two integers, if they are different, outputs what error occured.
CFG_AUTO_TEST_FLOATTests two floats, if they are different, outputs what error occured.
CFG_AUTO_TEST_TEXTTests two strings, if they are different, outputs what error occured.
CFG_LOG_OTHER_ERRORNo testing, just outputs what was passed in.
CFG_AUTO_SUMMARYOutputs summary, number of tests passed and total tests.

Macros

CFG_WRITE_HEADER

Outputs initial “greetings text”.

CFG_BEGIN_AUTO_TEST

Marks the start of automated test procedure.

CFG_AUTO_TEST_HEADER

Writes the header.

CFG_AUTO_TEST_BOOL

Tests two booleans, if they are different, outputs what error occured.

CFG_AUTO_TEST_INTEGER

Tests two integers, if they are different, outputs what error occured.

CFG_AUTO_TEST_FLOAT

Tests two floats, if they are different, outputs what error occured.

CFG_AUTO_TEST_TEXT

Tests two strings, if they are different, outputs what error occured.

CFG_LOG_OTHER_ERROR

No testing, just outputs what was passed in.

CFG_AUTO_SUMMARY

Outputs summary, number of tests passed and total tests.  If everything went right, outputs also that all tests passed.
